Social Media: Facebook: www.facebook.com/coophousingbcFlickr: www.flickr.com/photos/bchousingcoopsRSS: www.chf.bc.ca/feeds/rss.xmlTwitter: twitter.com/chfbcYouTube: www.youtube.com/user/coopsbc
Service Details: - A federation of member housing co-ops in BC- Represents co-op housing to the government and public- Provides education and resources to support housing co-ops- Also offers its members asset management planning, access to preferred financing, a group buying program, workshops and education conferences, Model Rules 2.0, an annual scholarship for students living in the CHF BC member housing co-ops, enews, Scoop magazine- Also advocates for a provincial rent supplement program to replace disappearing federal subsidies with its You Hold the Key Campaign
Address & Map: 1651 Commercial Dr, #220Vancouver, BC     V5L 3Y3View MapQuest Map
